latestAction.text: On agreeing to the Shadegg amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to the Shadegg amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

Mr. Obey raised a point of order against the Shadegg amendment (A043). Mr. Obey stated that the thrust of the amendment would change existing law and impose news duties not currently in effect, thus violating clause 2 of rule XXI of the Rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.

Mr. Farr raised a point of order against the Shadegg amendment (A004). Mr. Farr stated that the provisions of the amendment were not germane to the bill and was, therefor, in violation of the rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.
